text: @LaraLeaTrump @realDonaldTrump “Indian doctors used hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) for prophylaxis (preventive) treatment — the same drug the American media have politicized.Dharavi's COVID-19 infection rate dropped drastically from April through June. In July, new infections were very low,near zero on July 9.”
